  • + Filter DSL

More Like This Query

More like this query find documents that are “like” provided text by running it against one or more fields.

.Query(q => q
    .MoreLikeThis(fz => fz
        .OnFields(f => f.Name)
        .LikeText("elasticsearcc")
    )
);
